4 Days Left to Set your SMART Goals!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=580&user=10620> 	

Did you know? The SMART goal framework (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound) is scientifically proven to increase success rates.

Deadline to submit your 2025 Goals in DRIVE is March, 31st. Need help? The Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=580&user=10620>  has all the resources you need!

Deadline to submit your 2025 Goals in DRIVE is March, 31st. Need help? The Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=580&user=10620>  has all the resources you need!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-5-min.png> 	

Tanagra x Bab Al Shams Takeover

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=581&user=10620> 	
This Ramadan, Tanagra welcomes you to a peaceful retreat at Bab Al Shams Resort. Until April 6th, immerse yourself in a thoughtfully curated oasis where luxury blends seamlessly with the serenity of the desert.Experience our lobby lounge takeover featuring signature beverages and Ramadan treats, or enhance your stay in a newly renovated pool villa, elegantly adorned with Tanagra’s finest pieces.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a4fcdc3db9f3bbd319294d42c3456b841502268162.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/fd648a6318d0da79ff8a9d5002d9110b549216178.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a4fcdc3db9f3bbd319294d42c3456b841502268162.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

 ELITE Suhoor at One&Only One Za’abeel

This Ramadan, Tanagra welcomes you to a peaceful retreat at Bab Al Shams Resort. Until April 6th, immerse yourself in a thoughtfully curated oasis where luxury blends seamlessly with the serenity of the desert.Experience our lobby lounge takeover featuring signature beverages and Ramadan treats, or enhance your stay in a newly renovated pool villa, elegantly adorned with Tanagra’s finest pieces.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a4fcdc3db9f3bbd319294d42c3456b841502268162.png>

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

 ELITE Suhoor at One&Only One Za’abeel

ELITE hosted an exclusive Suhoor at Amassi by Selma Ben Omar at One&Only One Za’abeel on March 11. The intimate gathering welcomed 63 ELITE members for a refined evening of connection and indulgence. Guests enjoyed a curated Suhoor menu in an exquisite setting, complemented by Selma Ben Omar’s stunning designs. The event featured an exclusive showcase of luxury brands, including Tanagra, Baccarat, Christofle, Villari, and Lladró, presenting timeless home décor and tableware. Ghawali and Yeda enriched the ambiance with exquisite fragrances.
